Gives 1 Key

translation.1382440116:
You can call me Fumizuki.

translation.1850826261: Sortie 2 Aviation Battleships and 4 Ships to World 4-4 and defeat the boss.
translation.1633456696: [C2] Increase the Level of Training by Exercising!
translation.3851769922: Sortie Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, 1 Destroyer and 2 Ships to World 1-4, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.2049516104:
I tried improving my air presence, indeed.
Now I am a carrier... Indeed...
translation.2200412114: Enter Orel Bay and destroy the enemy transport fleet while protecting our own supply lines!
translation.2532929291: Admiral, I've attained a new form!
translation.3371955053: I-168 here. What, is that too hard? Okay, just call me Imuya. Nice to meet you!
translation.2586634115: Sortie 1-2 CLs as flagship and 4-5 DDs to World 2-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.1836283434:
I'm the girl who went on a diet and became an aircraft carrier, Chitose. Somehow I even got faster.
Is this is real me, I wonder?
translation.2627531043:
Oh, I haven't introduced myself yet?
I'm Arashio.
translation.4222124470: Form a fleet consisting of ships that excel at anti-submarine warfare and in anti-aircraft capabilities, and protect the transport ship routes!
translation.4259345360:
Unryuu class aircraft carrier, Unryuu, has arrived.
Admiral, let me handle the New Taskforce. ！
translation.3734832039: [A55] 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for Another Rush to the Northern Sea!
translation.4092536298: I'm Repair ship Akashi. If you take a little damage, I can fix you up in the base. Just leave it to me!
translation.4210405222:
Gives 5 Food Supply Ship Irako
(boost morale for the whole fleet)
translation.95891596:
My name is Mogami.
It's all right, I won't run into anyone this time, really!
translation.1347539765:
Good day, I'm Submarine Tender Taigei.
I may be inexperienced, but I am glad to be of service.
translation.3300759035: Have Tenryuu and Tatsuta in your main fleet.
translation.516198276: Engage in a daring night raid against the enemy fleet. Your goal is to destroy the transport they are escorting!
translation.1290891883: Sortie 3 Slow BB/BBVs, 1 CL and 2 Ships to World 5-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.

translation.552806214: [B40] Sortie the Remodeled Anti-Air Heavy Cruiser!

translation.2878036938: I'm Kiso. I'll bestow upon you the undeniably best victory.

translation.2263001951: Have Takao, Atago, Choukai and Maya in your main fleet.
translation.3814836917:
Yo! I'm Asashimo, 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class.
Please remember. Don't forget about me... ok?
translation.1220154293:
Ooi here, reborn as a heavy torpedo cruiser!
Long time no see!
translation.4225092515:
Cheers! I'm Suzukaze!
With me in your fleet, you won't have to worry about anything anymore!
translation.1749890828:
Nagatsuki here.
Don't make light of us destroyers. We're useful.
translation.4182008750: Get 4 victories in Exercises within the same day.
translation.563031676:
My name is Kisaragi.
Please keep me at your side.

The second ship of the Vittorio Veneto-class battleships, Littorio.

translation.2272484332:
Hello!

Lead ship of the Yamato-class battleships, Flagship Yamato.

I am Tone!

translation.3918516442: Get 5 victories in Exercises within the same day.

My name is Shikinami.

Destroyer Ooshio reporting in!

The fleet's idol, Naka here!

I'm the British-born returnee, Kongou!
Nice to meet you!
translation.2692203334:
Second of the Nagato-class battleships, Mutsu here. Pleased to meet you.

translation.4116478799:
Hi, I'm Ashigara. My specialty is surface combat.
Nice to meet you.

Protect Ship from Sinking

translation.1975372555:
Super-dreadnought, 1st of the Ise-class, Ise.
Setting off!

Asashio-class destroyer, Asagumo, reporting in!

translation.1832427021:

As long as I have planes, I wont lose!

Hello! Kagerou-class destroyer, Maikaze here!
I don't like it when it's gloomy outside!

We meet at last! I'm Kagerou.

Guten Tag... Ah, my mistake, sorry.
Please, call me Hachi.

Drop of oil ... fuel shortage resolved!

Nice to meet you! I'm Fubuki!

Second of the Agano-class light cruisers, Noshiro, has arrived.

I'm Akatsuki!

Akigumo, reporting for duty!

I'm the destroyer Asashio.

You're the commander, right? I'm Mikazuki.

Light aircraft carrier Shouhou, at your service.

please call me Yuu.

My name is Izumo Ma— wait, Hiyou.

Yuugumo-class destroyer, Makigumo here.

Excuse me. Second of the Yamato-class battleships here, Musashi.

Affordable Sortie Pack

Carrier Ryuuhou, remodeled from a Submarine Tender.

translation.182242884: [Bd7] Seize Control of the Southwestern Archipelago Sea!
translation.3071347309: Have Kongou, Hiei, Haruna and Kirishima in your main fleet.
translation.521192604: Mobilize for a patrol of the waters outside the naval base!
translation.2798558792: Sortie Choukai, Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa and Tenryuu to World 2-3 and defeat the boss.
translation.3492468291: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and 2 Ships to World 2-3 and defeat the boss.
translation.1748099343: Get 3 victories in Exercises within the same day.
translation.305306003:
As the first step of the Western strategy, carry out an operation to capture Jam Island!
(Take Anti-Submarine Precautions)
translation.2522890410:
My name is Tenryuu.
Heh, ya scared?
translation.3808053717: [Bw7] Destroy the Main Force of the Enemy's Northern Fleet!
translation.905466377:
I'm Isuzu. Leave the torpedo squadrons to me.
I'll bring victory to the Admiral with all my power. Pleased to meet you!
translation.4076966897: The Forefront of the Southern Sea
translation.3506120646: Perform 2 successful modernizations within the same day.
translation.753628775:
Dazzling the stage, Kinugasa here!
Take good care of Aoba and me!
translation.3970477202: We are Hatsuharu. We thank you in advance.
translation.1180188217:
My name is Natori...
I'll do my best not to cause you any trouble!
translation.1749244876: Perform 15 successful modernizations within the same week.
translation.4029921196: Sortie Abukuma as FS, Hibiki(K2), Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze to 3-2, beat the boss.
translation.1590299360:
Is a nice breeze coming?
It's time for me, the next generation
destroyer prototype, Amatsukaze, to debut.
translation.757527326: Ise-class Aviation Battleship, Hyuuga. Moving forth.
translation.1155347567: [G3] Proceed with Modernization, and Prepare for War!
translation.1027270501: Break through the enemy picket line in the Western Curry Ocean and destroy the core of the enemy fleet off the coast of Casgadama!
translation.2068527367: Hello, I'm Atago. Admiral, please remember it, okay?
translation.3005185623:
Super-dreadnought Fusou-class, the elder Fusou here.
Please take care of me along with my sister Yamashiro.
translation.3903793703:
Increases your ship capacity by 10 and your equipment capacity by 40!
(can only be bought 15 times)
translation.3295516659:
Second of the Furutaka-class heavy cruisers, Kako here.
Let's get along!
translation.2006162402:
So you're the commander, huh?
Well, you've better try your damn best.
translation.3385491553: The Oriental enemy forces have received a major blow by our fleet and are currently regathering at the Ri-Lanka Island harbour. Organise a military raid unit and destroy the enemy reinforcements!
translation.3902164545: [F10] Preparation for Large Ship Construction (Part II)
translation.496174362: Sortie Arashio, Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio and 2 Ships to World 2-3 and defeat the boss.
translation.605421769: Have Myoukou, Nachi, Ashigara and Haguro in your main fleet.
translation.4286795215:
Good morning. I am Takao.
It's great that you appear to be a model Admiral.
translation.3401050439: Have flagship equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron), then scrap 2 Tenzan.
translation.4102484666: [Bw10] Strive to Ensure the Security of the Marine Transportation Route!
translation.3385985428: [Bw9] Seize Air Superiority on the Southern Sea Coral Islands
translation.1645092519:
Submarine RO500, formerly U-boat U-511.
I'm Ro, formerly called Yuu!
Admiral? I will be in your care！
translation.1593608676: There is a movement of enemy reinforcements to the northern sea. Dispatch a medium size fleet, intercept the enemy reinforcements and destroy it!
translation.3461347405:
I'm the aviation battleship Ise!
With a rear-facing flight deck and 2 catapult launchers, I can make use of the power of aviation!
translation.191059606: [A14] Organize All 3 Sisters of the Sendai-class Light Cruisers!
translation.1993750592: [B46] Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE!
translation.681575674:
Aircraft carrier Hiryuu here.
Leave the carrier battles to me. I can fight on in each and every adversity.
translation.3794751683:
Fast battleship Haruna, reporting for duty.
You're the admiral, correct? Please take good care of me.
translation.2177834804:
You're the Admiral? I see. Anyway...
Second of the Ise-class battleships, Hyuuga. Remember me, if you will.
translation.980156100: [D8] Operation Contact Foreign Ship through Submarine Dispatch!
translation.2723837709:
We meet again, Admiral. It's me, Mogami.
How's my flight deck? Does it suit me?
translation.671668934:
Pyan♪ The fourth Agano class Light Cruiser, Sakawa!
Commander, nice to meet you!
translation.81507296:
I'm Kasumi.
What are we waiting for? Come on!
translation.504926536: Contains a large amount of furniture coins.
translation.2536631567: [D13] Carry Out the Deep Sea Submarine Operations!
translation.1936965615: [G4] Preparation for Large Ship Construction (Part I)!
translation.2192939382:
Protect and Recover Ship from Sinking
(Gives 1 Repair Goddess)
translation.3139229898:
Special-type destroyer, 'Akebono'.
Hey! Don't look at me, you dirty Admiral!
translation.893406: Sortie Choukai(K2) as FS, Furutaka/Kako/Aoba/Kinugasa/Yuubari/Tenryuu to 5-1, S-Rank Boss.
translation.1803866060: Sortie Hiryuu(Kai-2) as flagship, Souryuu(Kai-2) and 2 DDs to 5-2, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.4002897884: Sortie to World 1-2 AGAIN and clear the stage.
translation.3457407739: Sortie Haruna(Kai-2) and 5 Ships to World 5-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.2526789873: [B5] Intercept the Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet!
translation.2536074425: Have Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your second fleet.
translation.1806299611: Have Nachi, Ashigara, Tama and Kiso in your main fleet.
translation.2462785483: Sortie to World 1-1 and clear the stage.
translation.4031513405:
Hi hi! I'm the Shiratsuyu-class destroyer Murasame!
Everyone, nice to meet you!
translation.2142823284:
I'm Myoukou, nameship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers.
Let's work together.
translation.4043448793: An enemy invasion fleet is pressing on the defensive line in the Nansei Islands. Sail out in full force and destroy them!
translation.1335657380: Sortie Souryuu(Kai-2) as flagship, Hiryuu(Kai-2), 2 DDs and 2 Ship to 4-3, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.4156319117:
I am Akitsumaru, indeed.
Thank you for taking me into your fleet.
translation.2733331437: Have a flagship in your second fleet.
translation.1465796473: Have ONLY Akagi, Kaga, Hiryuu and Souryuu in your main fleet.
translation.3815990069: Sortie Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Mochizuki, Yayoi and 2 DDs to 3-2 and obtain a C-Rank at the boss.
translation.827912953: Perform 3 successful Expeditions within the same day.
translation.1578310828: [A13] Organize the Main Fleet with a Battleship and Heavy Cruisers!
translation.1508470743: Defeat the Boss in 2-3 with a Level 90 - 99 Flagship. (S Rank)
translation.1812180731: [B32] Rush the Battleship Force to the Northern Sea!
translation.3389689358: [F7] Intensify the Concentration in Developing Equipment!
translation.1708208076: Craft 3 pieces of Equipment. (Failures are OK)
translation.1718499952:
I'm Katori, a Training Cruiser.
Don't you worry... I'll be gentle in teaching you various things.
translation.1014920:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, first ship, Akizuki.
I'm reporting in here. Please leave it to me!
translation.1473050178: Have Unryuu as flagship in your main fleet.
translation.3426280930:
I'm Seaplane Tender Akitsushima!
Make sure to remember me along with this Taitei-chan, alright!
translation.3310032150: [A50] Reorganize the Mikawa Fleet and Prepare to Rush in!
translation.187096248:
Good day.
I am the Destroyer Max Schultz
But, Max is fine. Pleased to meet you.
translation.1757902093:
I'm Hatsukaze, nice to meet you.
Admiral, how many did you have before me, I wonder?
translation.592417170: Hold the Line at the Nansei Islands
translation.1814960664: Yo! Name's Maya, nice to meet you.
translation.3639219842: Sortie Mutsuki, Mochizuki, Uzuki and Yayoi to 1-5 and obtain a C-Rank or better at the boss.
translation.3086428089: Sortie 2 Battleships, 1 Light Carrier and 3 Ships to World 3-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.1068431451: [Bw8] Crush the Core of the Enemy's Eastern Fleet!
translation.1605665944:
Nice to meet you, I'm Tatsuta~
I hope Tenryuu hasn't been causing you trouble~
translation.3374202276: Have a Seaplane Tender in your fleet.
translation.956812105:
My name is Samidare! I look forward to working with you.
Please leave any escort missions to me!
translation.3016720630: [Bd2] Destroy the Main Force of the Enemy Fleet!
translation.3789109318: [A11] Organize a Carrier Task Force in Your Second Fleet!
translation.436206296: Sortie a CL as FS, 3-5 DDs and 2 CLs to World 1-4 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.1757921482: Have Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your main fleet.
translation.2133504104: There are reports of an enemy counteroffensive. Form a cruiser patrol group and track their movements!
translation.4131213102: [A46] Organize a Light Surface Counterattack Fleet!
translation.408926878:
Arare....
I won't say 'ncha-'... Look after me...
translation.1221805359:
Light cruiser, Tama here.
I'm not a cat, meow.
translation.598523563: Have Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, 1 Light Cruiser and 3 Destroyers in your main fleet.
translation.1325526086: [A18] Organize Both Sisters of the Ise-class Battleships!
translation.2270106801:
Chitose here. I'm the first Japanese seaplane tender.
Nice to meet you!
translation.1764270028: [A41] Deploy the New Standard Aircraft Carrier Class!
translation.2669558709:
Lead ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Yuugumo, has arrived.
Admiral, it's fine to spoil me, you know.
translation.2299681592: Sortie to 5-2 and get an S-Rank at the boss node 2 times
translation.2253033470: Have 2 Heavy Cruiser in your fleet.(no CAV)
translation.631277027:
I'm the aircraft carrier Akagi.
If you need a mobile carrier squadron, just leave everything to me.
translation.194263487: Sortie 36 times, meet 24 bosses, defeat 12 bosses, and get 6 S ranks.
translation.696794260: [D10] Enhance the Use of Aviation Firepower!
translation.1517237755:
12th Kagerou-class destroyer, Isokaze.
Don't worry, I will protect you.
translation.184643100: [A16] Organize a Fast Battleship Force with the Kongou-class!
translation.3283992230:
There is an enemy fleet patrolling off the Cam Ranh Peninsula.
Intercept them!
translation.1455626330:
Good day.
I am Bismarck, the nameship of the Bismarck-class battleships.
You should remember it well.
translation.855607121: Have Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi, and Shiranui in your fleet.
translation.1993263324:
Nice to meet you... Maruyu, reporting for duty.
Huh? You haven’t heard about me? How could that be...
translation.1056486267: We are executing Operation MO. Form a carrier battle group and crush the enemy task force!
translation.3479230116:
I'm the 4th battleship of the Vittorio Veneto-class, Roma. Nice to meet you.
What? Please don't stare at me, okay?
translation.1360457467: [F8] Strengthen the Fleet by Constructing Shipgirls!
translation.2866966859: Sortie Akatsuki(K2), Hibiki(K2), Ikazuchi, and Inazuma to 1-5, A-Rank or better at the Boss.
translation.849733080:
Fourth ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers, Haguro.
Together with everyone, I will support the front lines!
translation.3226438351: [B30] The Torpedo Squadron Bashi Island Emergency Deployment!
translation.956292269: [Bm2]Sortie to World 6-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss 3 times.
translation.3251857731: Get 20 victories in Exercises within the same week.
translation.751740480:
You are my commander?
I am Nachi. I appreciate your contribution.
translation.1926014614: Second Battle of the Solomon Sea
translation.76346961: I'm... Hatsuyuki... Nice to meet you.
translation.1015723710:
Instant Construction Pack
(Gives 5 Fast Construcion Material)
translation.4219101123:
Nagato class' 2nd ship and from there, Mutsu.
Of course, I'm part of the world's big 7.
Ehh? The gunpowder explosion accident?
Well, can't cover it up anymore right? This time will be fine!
translation.2174457417:
Lead ship of the Yamato-class battleships, Flagship Yamato.
Heading forth!
translation.1046276014:
5th Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Harusame, yes.
Leave the transport missions to me... desu.
translation.1650528021:
Aircraft carrier, Houshou here.
Though I'm inexperienced, I look forward to your guidance.
translation.1774409677:
Hello. I'm light cruiser Ooi.
Pleased to make your acquaintance.
translation.3415646862: With a high-speed fleet of only Destroyers, rush the enemy-infested waters around Kis Island and assist the garrison there!
translation.3145007425: Have Souryuu(Kai-2) as flagship with Hiryuu(Kai-2) and 2 Destroyers in your main fleet.
translation.214561133: D14] Expand the Result of the Deep Sea Submarine Operations!
translation.4146591572: Have Fusou and Yamashiro in your main fleet.
translation.1077719770:
A brand new Kitakami... that's me, all right.
I feel a lot more grown up, loaded to the brim with oxygen torpedos.
translation.3637300377: [C5] Strive to Increase the Level of the Fleet's Training!
translation.1660710113:
Construction and Development Pack
(Gives 7 Development Material)
translation.1800039644: Expand to the forward part of the MS Archipelago sea, seize the enemy fleet that is slowly advancing to capture the archipelago, and destroy them with all your might!
translation.687753534:
Hello! I-58 here!
You can call me Goya. I won't be bitter!
translation.1058299527:
U-Um... my name is Isonami.
Pleased to meet you.
translation.89086556: Have a Battleship and 2 Heavy Cruisers in your main fleet.
translation.653469309:
Hi, thanks for your time! I'm Aoba!
Could you spare a few words?!
translation.2349585631: [A54] 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for a Rush to the Northern Sea!
translation.1216704446: I'm here I'm here! Kinu has finally arrived!
translation.3627624050:
I am the battleship Nagato. Pleased to meet you.
Just leave the enemy battleships to me.
translation.897358290: Sortie 1-2 CVL, 1 CL and 3-4 DDs to World 2-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.3883567308: [B18] Sortie an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet!
translation.1529735316: Sortie a Light/Standard Carrier flagship and 5 Light Cruisers, Destroyers or Seaplane Tenders.
translation.3241451769:
I'm happy to see that you're such a great Admiral.
I'm I-19. Please call me Iku!
translation.2304161168: Organize a small seek-and-destroy ASW fleet to clean up the submarine-infested waters near the naval base!
translation.3268026147:
Um... I'm light cruiser Jintsuu...
Pleased to meet you...
translation.43635503:
I'm Hibi-- Verniy.
That name refers to the meaning of "reliance".
translation.4048178580: Have Abukuma(K2) as FS, Hibiki(K2), Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze in your main fleet.
translation.1380257152: Sortie ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma to any map.
translation.3864967812: Have ONLY Hatsuharu, Hatsushimo, Nenohi and Wakaba in your main fleet
translation.1066368251:
Greetings, I'm Mikuma.
I wonder where Mogami could be hiding?
translation.3286328934:
I'm Zuihou.
I'm a light aircraft carrier, but with some experience, I'll be as good as a regular carrier! Just you see!
translation.3561821443:
Good morning! It's the remodelled Taihou!
Reinforced deck armor! Even higher defence! An increase in planes to boost my air wing just for you, admiral!
translation.1500057369: Have Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki and 1 Destroyer in your main fleet
translation.3005613589: [B41] Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet to the Solomon Waters!
translation.3601354047: Allows a ship to avoid being sank once.
translation.952087724: We are undertaking operations to control the Curry Ocean. Secure the mines and incapacitate the enemy fleet!
translation.1825681793: Sortie Arare, Kagerou, Kasumi, Shiranui and 2 Ships to World 3-1 and defeat the boss.
translation.3133410426: Challenge 3 other fleets in Exercises within the same day.(Defeat is OK)
translation.1136588853: Sortie Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba, Hatsushimo and 2 Ships to World 3-1, S-Rank at the boss.
translation.3609751816: Deploy a fleet consisting of seaplane tenders equipped with flying boats or recon planes, light cruisers and destroyers, and carry out the aerial scout mission "Operation K"!
translation.3566387895:
Admiral, Light Cruiser Ooyodo has joined the battle lines.
Please leave the fleet administration & supervision to me.
translation.1335444779:
Good day, Admiral. I'm I-401, the second ship in my special submarine series.
Just call me Shioi!
translation.2179053505: Sortie 2 CV/CVLs, 2 DDs and 2 Ships to World 4-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.3514587665: [D12] (Continuation) Enhance the Use of Aviation Firepower!
translation.1578307218:
Admiral, I'm Tanikaze!
I'll be in your care from now on.！
translation.2545542516: Sortie Tenryuu, Tatsuta and 2 Ships to World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.
translation.983587351:
I'm Amagi, an Unryuu-class Carrier!
Admiral, this time Amagi can play an active role!
